top_comments_top.body:
Hello and welcome to r/LifeProTips!

Please help us decide if this post is a good fit for the subreddit by up or downvoting this comment. 

If you think that this is great advice to improve your life, please upvote. If you think this doesn't help you in any way, please downvote. If you don't care, leave it for the others to decide.
THANK YOU. This is such a pet peeve for me. “How it looks/sounds/smells/feels like” 😖 I don’t know how this started, but it’s awful.
Grammar lessons are not Life Pro Tips.
Can you give an example in a sentence please?
Languages change and evolve over time. Get used to it.
